title: Nerfed Akali into the Ground
body:
Riot have yall ever put any thought into balancing champions? or do yall just have zero idea how to do your job? You literally took away half of akalis damage...... HALF! At lvl 18 akalis full combo ranges from 4500-5000 dmg and now it peaks at 2800. 

Akali.... one of the lowest win rate champions. Geeee wouldn't it be a splended idea to nerf the lowest win rate champion until shes no longer played? 

HOW ABOUT YOU JUST DO YOUR JOBS! If you cant make her balanced then revert her... simple (suck up your pride, and fix the damnn champ)

replies.body:
I mean akali is completely busted even at this point so just relax about that.

But yes Riot is a bunch of incompetent people. They still havent noticed that renekton can literally half shot you at lvl 1 by press w without rage bar. So yea I guess Riot is doing their best
At some point they should really stop letting CertainlyT design champions.

Honestly I just really hate Akali's shroud in a teamfight. I feel like there's not a lot of counterplay for it.

She can keep her damage.

> [{quoted}](name=P0IS0N IVY,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AJ9JHI62,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-05-31T08:07:03.528+0000)
>
> Honestly I just really hate Akali's shroud in a teamfight. I feel like there's not a lot of counterplay for it.
> 
> She can keep her damage.

You can walk away from it. It's that simple

Riot balancing team has no idea what they are doing. 

At this point why is anyone surprised with nonsense like this. 

Look at Sylas LOL
Looking at Sylas... He is slightly overpowered, has a solid winrate, and incredibly annoying in lane. What am i looking for?

When a full ap assassin can not put out more than 2800 dmg with a complete combo at lvl 18, theres a problem.... look at zed, talon, and kats dmg at lvl 18 full build... akali is done

I am very bitter about this... 250K mastery points later

4 gapclosers, a slow, 2 movement speed buffs, a stun, an execute, and invisibility. If you cant kill someone with all that you are mentally reta-rded. In fact the pros know this too, she is basically pickbanned at high elo, and pros. 

Winrate does not equal balance. I could have a champ that point and click 1100 range instakills someone with a 5 min cooldown. This champ has a 50% WR, so it's balanced right? Hell no. Akali is obnoxious cancer and to be honest is the next yasuo. That champion will never have a 50% wr because she would be the best champion in the entire game hands down.
